topic.title: Zeroid.bit portability
topic.body: Hello! Sorry I'm really new to zeronet, just started to lurk today. I really like the ease of use of the zeroid authentication, but how do I carry this with me on other computers? Does it save some sort of a token on the PC? I'm using Linux if it matters

4_15Q5U52Aqgjb66GkzhkGKDYgWsqR8TEkJG.body: How does one apply this to their zeronet proxy?
